meanings.definition: To bring together into one group or place.
meanings.sent1: She gathers her toys in a basket.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gathers the students for a group photo.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathers all the nuts in one spot for a nutty party.
meanings.sent4: The storm gathers dark clouds before the rain pours down.
meanings.sent5: He gathers all his courage to speak in front of the class.

meanings.sent1: He gathers stamps from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The farmer gathers ripe apples from the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The child gathers colorful pebbles on the beach like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The singer gathers applause from the audience after a stunning performance.
meanings.sent5: The detective gathers clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.sent1: She gathers her hair into a ponytail.
meanings.sent2: The magnet gathers the metal paperclips.
meanings.sent3: The vacuum cleaner gathers all the dust bunnies under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The leader gathers the team for a quick meeting.
meanings.sent5: The spider gathers its web to catch its prey.
